attributes.title: Baelish
attributes.place: The Fingers, The Vale of Arryn

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, his story is the same.
sections.Biography: During the [[War of the Ninepenny Kings]], he fought for the favor of Lord [[Hoster Tully]], [[Lord of Riverrun]] and [[Lord Paramount of the Trident]]. He won his friendship and Lord Hoster agreed to [[Ward|foster]] Baelish's son [[Petyr Baelish|Petyr]] at [[Riverrun]] alongside his own children [[Catelyn Stark|Catelyn]], [[Lysa Arryn|Lysa]] and [[Edmure Tully|Edmure]].<ref>"[[House Baelish (Histories & Lore)]]"</ref>
